Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-64437 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.5.3-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-64437 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.5.3-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 1.5.3-2, affected by CVE-2025-64437
